column1: This morning on @MeetThePress @sendavidperdue talked about the illegitimate impeachment process in the House that denied @POTUS due process. It's time to end the circus and get back to work for the American people! #gapol https://t.co/TuJTfE0zhO

Back in the Peach State after a productive week in Washington. Proud to back the President's landmark trade deal with China vote for #USMCA and meet with great Georgians like Carolyn Meadows President of the @NRA. #gapol https://t.co/oaQbUfR3Xu
Honored to be with you! #gapol https://t.co/J8Jrz4OAwb

Great to be back in Atlanta with @NRA President and fellow Georgian Carolyn Meadows. Truly appreciate her work in Washington and around the country to protect and defend our 2nd Amendment Rights. #gapol https://t.co/CAWS9FbEUk

Excited to be down in Savannah for the Southern Cotton Growers and Southeastern Cotton Ginners annual meeting. Appreciate the opportunity to share my story and strong commitment to agriculture with hardworking farmers from Georgia and beyond! #gapol https://t.co/ERcgS7eACl
Eager to work with Chairman @SenMikeLee as a member of the Joint Economic Committee. Together we will keep America strong and growing! #gapol https://t.co/5Pw99HwliO
Great meeting Jason Ouimet today. Appreciate his leadership at the @NRAILA and their efforts to protect our 2nd Amendment Rights. #gapol https://t.co/yTrBlzpCXt

Earlier today I voted to pass #USMCA. This historic deal will keep trading channels open keeps supply chains in North America and sends a message to the world that the United States is the best place for business.#gapol
I look forward to partnering with @PYNance and @CWforA on issues important to Georgia women and families! #gapol https://t.co/M4XxYeoXb9

Today @POTUS signed a historic trade deal w/ China that will secure a bright future for our nation. Through this agreement we will back GA farmers bolster American manufacturing & keep our country safe. I applaud @POTUS and his Admin for their resilience on this landmark deal.
Growing up on a soybean farm I had a few  stories to share today with @SenPatRoberts and leaders from @ASA_Soybeans.  #gapol https://t.co/GMUQX0yyFS
Very honored to meet with the @SenateAg Chairman @SenPatRoberts and appreciate his willingness to come down to Georgia for a meeting with Peach State farmers! #gapol https://t.co/5gYwAX5qIv
As a pro-life Christian conservative I look forward to working with @tperkins and the @FRCdc to advance policies that protect the unborn and most vulnerable among us. #gapol https://t.co/bPhICpODhl

Proud to cast my 1st committee vote in favor of moving #USMCA trade agreement to the full Senate. The passage of USMCA will provide GA farmers manufacturers & small biz with more certainty & better access to trading partners. USMCA will keep our statecountry growing! #gapol https://t.co/8fBZlYsfAA
.@RepStefanik is a courageous leader in the House. So proud of her boldness during the impeachment process and look forward to working together soon! #gapol https://t.co/6f7r4eK95r
Great to spend some time with my colleague and fellow southerner @SenTomCotton. Appreciate his leadership at the U.S. Capitol and service in the @USArmy. #gapol https://t.co/hfxLqzsXPR

.@GaPorts are an economic engine and create incredible opportunities for all Georgians. Proud to stand with @RepBuddyCarter in support of SHEP and will do my part to see this project through so we can realize our full potential. #gapol https://t.co/NMb1XhnPld

@veterans @SecWilkie and I are teaming up to champion Georgia’s 700000 veterans. Together we will make sure these American heroes  have the care and benefits they  deserve. #gapol https://t.co/EgK2OojPR5

I met with @RepMarkMeadows today for the latest on this impeachment sham in Washington. He agrees that it’s time to end the partisan games and get Congress back to work for the American people! #gapol https://t.co/Rq9UQRh4uc

Honored to share my story and legislative priorities with @SenatorTimScott. We have both lived the American Dream and I look forward to working with him to keep opportunity and hope alive for generations to come. #gapol https://t.co/4lOk83NVI6

The train car that runs to the Capitol is a little noisy but I wanted to provide a quick update. This week we are voting to confirm the @fema Admin & will have meetings about veterans affairs agriculture & other pressing issues in our state/country. Stay tuned for more! #gapol https://t.co/CsBHoHiqaO
Truly an evil industry that must be stopped. #gapol https://t.co/uTD0cR7jEl
Together we’re raising awareness helping victims and aggressively pursuing criminal prosecutions. (2 of 2) #gapol

Human trafficking is a heinous crime that exploits the most vulnerable. I am grateful to @GAFirstLady & @IvankaTrump  for their leadership in combatting modern day slavery. Georgia has a strong partner in the administration in our shared mission to end human trafficking. (1 of 2)
Thank you to the Overton Park building management for this beautiful welcome gift! #peachesandcreamcake #gapol https://t.co/SyMoqxrARP
Best of luck to members of the Georgia General Assembly as they begin the 2020 Legislative Session! #gapol https://t.co/DmdfSaH0um
Congratulations to Col. Amy Holbeck on becoming the Georgia Air National Guard's first female wing commander at @RobinsAFB_GA today! #gapol https://t.co/xLismPiMQr

I sat down with Carolyn Ryan from @cbs46 to recap my 1st week in office. While I'm proud of what we accomplished there's still more work to be done. With your help we will advance policies that protect the American Dream & ensure a bright future for our state & country! #gapol https://t.co/sCbtkpmmKt
It’s #HumanTraffickingAwarenessDay and we are so grateful for @GAFirstLady and her work to end modern slavery. RT her video to help save a life! #gapol https://t.co/1GIBmWiI6e
I also backed three bills that will protect the unborn. Thank you for your kind words and prayers. Stay tuned for more updates! (2 of 2) #gapol

While still trying to find my way around I'm proud of what we accomplished this week. In addition to backing the WH's pick for SBA Admin I co-sponsored resolutions applauding @POTUS's decision on Soleimani & urging an end to the impeachment sideshow. (1 of 2) #gapol
I signed on to @LindseyGrahamSC 's resolution because it's time to end the partisan games and get back to work for the American people! #gapol https://t.co/S5aHkCP3JG

.@SenDanSullivan stopped by to talk about ways we can honor our nation's heroes on the Veterans Affairs Committee. Also told the Senator about visiting his state (Alaska) twenty years ago to run my first marathon! #gapol https://t.co/P8yzIvd5wu
Great meeting with @RepRobWoodall. I look forward to taking a tour of Georgia's 7th Congressional District with him soon! #gapol https://t.co/zC7uiGk8QY

I am proud to co-sponsor three bills (S. 109 S. 160 S. 130) to protect the unborn. As a woman of devout faith and a pro-life conservative I will always seek ways to advance and promote pro-life policies in the U.S. Senate. #gapol
Thank you for the warm welcome! #gapol https://t.co/3SGJzkwjgU
Thanks @SenJoniErnst! Look forward to using my experience on the farm and in business to champion American ag! #gapol https://t.co/apJZm2SDBX
Just ran into @UnitedWay CEOs from across Georgia. Appreciate all of the work they do to strengthen & grow local communities. Great way to start off the morning! #gapol https://t.co/igEAB1GpCQ
On Monday I took the Oath of Office and officially began my service in the United States Senate. I am honored humbled and ready to work! #TBT #gapol https://t.co/FcGHLVk3hg

Thank you for your leadership in our state and country @SecretarySonny. I look forward to working together in support of Georgia agriculture and farmers throughout our great nation! #gapol #GeorgiaGrown https://t.co/e1bxVoYzG6
Great to talk ag with @AustinScottGA08. Appreciate the invitation to join him for a day in Middle Georgia at @RobinsAFB_GA and @GaFarmBureau. #gapol https://t.co/CiHWqvdbPx

After a productive meeting at the White House we had a classified briefing on the Middle East. The information provided reinforced my conviction that @POTUS made the right decision to eliminate Qasem Soleimani. #gapol https://t.co/kMbEiDHT6I

What an honor to meet with @RepTomGraves today. Great discussion on how we can work together for the betterment of our state and country. Really appreciate his wise counsel and support. #gapol https://t.co/JrEHEqnPoI

Productive meeting this morning with Eric Ueland and Amy Swonger from the President’s Legislative Affairs Team. I look forward to working with @POTUS to champion our farmers advance fair trade deals take care of our veterans and keep Americans safe. #gapol https://t.co/XwKybunIm8

In DC tonight monitoring the situation in Iraq. We are praying for the safety of our troops the comfort of their families & the strength to defend against those who want to destroy our way of life. I have confidence in @POTUS & his Administration as they lead us forward.#gapol

It's my 1st FULL day in the Senate & I wanted to provide a quick update. This morning we reviewed pending legislation & pressing issues of the day. I signed on to a resolution by @SenTedCruz that commends the WH on eradicting Soleimani & had lunch w/ fellow Senators. Stay tuned! https://t.co/YNxZfRHDoC

What an honor to serve our state and country in the U.S. Senate!  After being sworn in by @VP I cast my first vote to support @POTUS's pick to lead the @SBAgov. So grateful to be here. More to come! #gapol https://t.co/CuAhAFcSs6
What an honor to serve with you @sendavidperdue! I look forward to partnering for the betterment of our state and country! #gapol https://t.co/bp3CIRwhwb
Thank you @SenJohnThune! https://t.co/UzLSIksk5t
Thank you @SenatorRounds! I look forward to serving w/ you! #gapol https://t.co/cRZm7ZAsPr
Thank your @GovKemp for this incredible opportunity to serve our state and nation! #gapol https://t.co/W2ZtGOA8eY
Honored by your kind words @GAFirstLady! #gapol https://t.co/cotMpWnH96
Thanks @RepTomGraves! Look forward to working together! https://t.co/i0z58g4IDR
Thank you for your kind words Mr. @Georgia_AG ! We have a great team and will deliver real results for Georgia families! #gapol https://t.co/FC1Q4D7FYZ
Thank you Congressman @AustinScottGA08! I look forward to working together soon! #gapol https://t.co/OR6LZL0nT9
Thank you for your service to our state and nation @SenatorIsakson! I will carry on your legacy of service to our Georgia veterans farmers and families! #gapol https://t.co/cZrKNUuosA

Look forward to serving on the Senate Health Education Labor and Pensions Committee with Chairman @SenAlexander. By working together we can lower healthcare costs and enhance educational outcomes in every part of our country. #gapol https://t.co/xvDf7QzPXG

Honored to serve on the Senate Committees on Agriculture; Veterans' Affairs; Health Education Labor and Pensions. Look forward to doing my part to keep Georgia - and America - strong!  https://t.co/n3SnJBf6tx #gapol
Georgians are especially fortunate that their next senator will be fighting for them as a member of these important committees. #gapol
.@senatemajldr: "Georgia has a proud tradition of sending outstanding public servants to the U.S. Senate and Kelly Loeffler has the character talent and experience to carry on this legacy."

Productive meeting this morning with @SenJohnThune. Appreciate his years of service and look forward to working together to advance policies that spur economic growth and opportunity. #gapol https://t.co/nv7Nl9wHj3

Honored to meet w/ @SenJoniErnst to discuss legislative priorities for 2020. We share a love of agriculture & appreciation for farm families who create economic opportunity in rural communities throughout our country. Together we will keep America growing! #GeorgiaGrown #gapol https://t.co/a1cMpj65kh

Democrats should stop this circus & get to work w/ @realDonaldTrump to finish USMCA lower healthcare costs secure our borders & build on record job creation. Congress needs to end this sideshow & get back to work to support our country’s historic economic growth. (2 of 2)

Today radical Democrats in Washington again proved how out of touch they are with the American people. This impeachment sham is nothing more than a diversion and abuse of taxpayer funds to overturn the 2016 election. (1 of 2) #gapol

.@senatemajldr: ‘It was a pleasure to meet with Senator-designate Kelly Loeffler this morning. It is already clear that @GovKemp  has made a terrific choice." https://t.co/cU33gRr66j #gapol https://t.co/kffEsfTgTr

Cameron Scott Walters of Richmond Hill was one of the three victims at #NASPensacola. Our prayers are with the sailors’ families and loved ones as they mourn. We will never forget the courage and bravery of these American heroes. #gapol
Best of luck to @GeorgiaFootball as they battle @LSUfootball in the #SECChampionship! #GoDawgs
Thanks @SenJoniErnst! Look forward to swapping a few @4H stories and working together for the betterment of our nation! https://t.co/9FDcAFUvKo
Honored to earn your trust and support @GovKemp and look forward to working with @POTUS and @sendavidperdue to advance policies that Keep America Great! https://t.co/BYj7UkRb1H
Thank you Senator! https://t.co/skibYwL4hK
I look forward to working together soon @CongressmanHice! https://t.co/KwQYUDdf2U
Thank you for your strong support Mr. Attorney General! I look forward to working together soon! https://t.co/TTkRRcRj31
